FAQ.title: Frequently Asked Questions
FAQ.subtitle: Everything you need to know about creating your custom lithophane

bestPhotos.q: What kind of photos work best?
bestPhotos.a: Clear, well-lit portraits or high-quality artwork work best. Photos with good contrast and detail will produce the most stunning results. We recommend images with at least 1080p resolution for optimal quality.

leadTime.q: How long does it take to create and ship?
leadTime.a: Once you upload your photo and confirm the design, we typically complete production within 3‚Äì5 business days. Shipping takes an additional 2‚Äì3 days within the Netherlands and 5‚Äì7 days for international orders.

sizes.a: We offer several sizes: Small (15√ó20 cm), Medium (20√ó25 cm), Large (25√ó30 cm), and Extra Large (30√ó40 cm). All sizes include the LED backlighting system and stand.

preview.q: Can I preview my lithophane before it's made?
preview.a: Yes! After you upload your photo, we provide a digital preview showing how your lithophane will look when illuminated. You can request adjustments before we begin production.

monoVsCmyk.q: What's the difference between Mono and CMYK lithophanes?
monoVsCmyk.a: Mono lithophanes are black and white, perfect for portraits and detailed photos with depth and shadows. CMYK lithophanes are full-color‚Äîideal for artwork and images that benefit from vibrant illumination.

ledIncluded.a: Yes! Every lithophane comes with a custom-fitted LED backlighting system that provides uniform illumination. The LED system is energy-efficient and includes a power adapter.

satisfaction.q: What if I'm not satisfied with the result?
satisfaction.a: We offer a 30-day money-back guarantee. If you're not completely satisfied with your lithophane, we'll work with you to make it right or provide a full refund.

multiOrder.q: Can I order multiple lithophanes with different photos?
multiOrder.a: Absolutely! You can order as many lithophanes as you want, each with different photos. We also offer discounts for bulk orders of 3 or more.

contact.title: Still have questions?
contact.blurb: Our team is here to help you create the perfect lithophane.

FinalCTA.subheading: Create a one-of-a-kind gift that will light up their world and preserve your precious memories forever.

hero.title: Get In Touch
hero.subtitle: We'd love to hear from you! Whether you're looking for the perfect gift or designing something truly personal, our team is here to help ‚Äî wherever you are in the world.

about.title: About Dreamli
about.body: Dreamli is a creative gift shop where imagination meets craftsmanship. We help people find or create meaningful presents through 3D printing, custom design, and eco-friendly materials, turning special moments into lasting memories. Our studio is proudly based in Groningen, the Netherlands, and we ship worldwide so anyone can bring their dream gift to life.

meta.title: Terms & Conditions | Dreamli
meta.description: Read Dreamli‚Äôs Terms & Conditions covering orders, delivery benefits, returns for personalized items, AI-generated models licensing, liability, privacy, and more.

company.title: Company Information
company.body: Dreamli is part of OmniTechs V.O.F. (KvK 93814429, Resedastraat 39, 9713TN Groningen, Netherlands, info@dreamli.nl). These terms apply to all orders placed via Dreamli.nl.

products.title: Products
products.body: We help you choose amazing gifts‚Äîor make them from scratch. With our AI Gift Assistant and a hands-on design team, you can discover smart recommendations or commission personalized pieces (3D-printed, engraved, photo-based, and more).

orders.title: Orders & Payment
orders.body: A contract is formed when you place an order and we confirm it. Payment is required at checkout via iDEAL, Stripe, or card. Prices are in EUR and include VAT unless stated otherwise. We may refuse or cancel an order (e.g., unsuitable files, production constraints, obvious pricing errors); if payment was taken, we will refund you.

delivery.title: Delivery & Delay Benefits
delivery.body: Delivery time is 3‚Äì10 business days from order confirmation. We typically ship with PostNL or DHL. We are not responsible for carrier-caused delays.

points.onTime: Delivered on day 3‚Äì10 (business days): you earn a 10% discount on your next order. It‚Äôs added to your account as a coupon/credit and is valid on your next purchase (one per user per order).
points.delayed: Exceeds 10 business days: your next purchase is free up to ‚Ç¨100. Credit is added to your account (one per user per delayed order). Eligibility is determined solely by Dreamli‚Äôs records; carrier statements do not affect eligibility.

returns.title: Returns
returns.body: Under EU law, a 14-day right of withdrawal generally applies; however, it does not apply to personalized goods (Article 6:230p BW). Because our products are made to order, they cannot be returned unless they arrive damaged, defective, or materially different from the agreed design. Please notify us promptly with photos; if validated, we will repair, replace, or refund. Return shipping for validated defects is covered by us.

cashback.title: Cashback & Site Credit Policy
cashback.body: Each order qualifies for a chance to receive site credit based on your current order value:
cashback.notice: Credits are added to your Dreamli account and can be used on future purchases. Credits are non-transferable and not redeemable for cash unless we state otherwise. We may change or end promotions prospectively; credits already awarded remain valid per their terms.

ai.title: AI-Generated Models & Licensing
ai.intro: Our website may generate digital assets (e.g., 3D models, images) via our AI systems. Unless expressly agreed otherwise in writing:

points.license: You receive a personal, non-exclusive, non-transferable, non-commercial licence to use such AI-generated content.
points.commercial: Commercial use (resale, mass production, distribution) is only permitted via Dreamli‚Äôs authorized channel under a separate commercial licence. We can facilitate mass production‚Äîcontact us for terms.
points.rights: You confirm you have rights to any input (e.g., drawings, photos) you upload and that it doesn‚Äôt infringe third-party rights.

liability.title: Liability
liability.body: We are not liable for misuse or modifications of products. To the maximum extent permitted by law, we exclude liability for indirect or consequential loss. Our total liability per order is limited to the order value. Adult supervision may be required for children; some parts may be small or fragile.

ip.title: Intellectual Property
ip.body: All website, branding, and product designs belong to Dreamli. By uploading a drawing or file, you warrant you have the right to use it. You grant Dreamli a limited licence to reproduce and process it for production and order fulfilment (and, if you separately consent, for showcasing).

privacy.title: Privacy & Cookies
privacy.body: We handle your data according to our Privacy Policy. Please review it for details on what we collect, how we use it, and your rights.

law.title: Law & Disputes
law.body: These terms are governed by Dutch law. Disputes will be handled by the competent courts in the Netherlands.

changes.title: Changes
changes.body: We may update these terms. The version at the time of your order applies. Continued use of our services after changes constitutes acceptance of the updated terms.

meta.title: Privacy Policy | Dreamli Data Protection & Cookie Policy
meta.description: How Dreamli collects, uses, and protects personal data for families, creators, and partners‚Äîyour rights and choices explained.

intro.title: Introduction
intro.body: Dreamli (OmniTechs V.O.F.) respects your privacy and processes personal data in accordance with the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) and applicable data protection laws. This privacy policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your personal information.

provided.title: Information You Provide
items: Personal details (name, email address, phone number)

cookies.title: Cookies and Analytics
items: Google Analytics data (only with your consent)

orders.title: Order Processing
items: Create and ship your personalized products

contract.title: Contract
contract.body: Processing necessary to fulfill your orders and provide our services

obligation.title: Legal Obligation
obligation.body: Compliance with tax laws and other legal requirements

consent.title: Consent
consent.body: Analytics, marketing communications, and non-essential cookies

interest.title: Legitimate Interest
interest.body: Security measures, fraud prevention, and business operations

block.title: Retention Periods
items: Account data: Until you request deletion
Marketing data: Until you withdraw consent

neverSell.title: We Never Sell Your Data
neverSell.body: Your personal information is never sold to third parties for marketing purposes.

onlyWith.title: We only share data with:
items: Payment processors: To handle secure transactions
Shipping companies: To deliver your orders
IT and hosting providers: To maintain our services
Google Analytics: Only with your explicit consent

access.title: Access
access.body: Request a copy of your personal data

erase.title: Deletion
erase.body: Request removal of your data (where legally possible)

portability.title: Portability
portability.body: Receive your data in a portable format

complaint.title: Complaint
complaint.body: File a complaint with the data protection authority

cookies.title: Cookies Policy

essential.title: Essential Cookies
essential.body: These cookies are necessary for the website to function and cannot be switched off:

analytics.title: Analytics Cookies (Optional)
analytics.body: These cookies help us understand how visitors use our website:

cookies.note: You can change your cookie preferences at any time through our cookie banner or by contacting us.

security.title: Security Measures

how.title: How We Protect Your Data
items: SSL encryption for all data transmission

security.disclaimer: While we implement industry-standard security measures, no system can be 100% secure. We continuously work to improve our security practices.
